content.question: English entrepreneurs financed the establishment of New World colonies primarily through

choices.label: subsidies and loans from the royal family
private funds from the creation of joint-stock companies
investment funds from European national banks
profits received from pirate activities and attacks on Spanish fleets
money and materials borrowed from the Dutch

content.answer: private funds from the creation of joint-stock companies

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
